text: Intumwa (Muhamadi) yemeye ibyoyahishuriwe biturutse kwa Nyagasani wayo ndetse n’abemera (barabyemeye). Buri wese yemeye Allah, abamalayika be, ibitabo byen’intumwa ze; (bavuga bati) "Nta n’imwe turobanura mu ntumwa Baranavuga bati "Twumvise kandi ze". twumviye. (Turagusaba) imbabazi, Nyagasani wacu! Kandi iwawe ni ho byose bizasubira
